data.message: Practice what you preach.....I got an Atlas on my cheeks that's how much my ass on the street.....I need mad money ...this paycheck to paycheck shit ain't funny....I'd start slinging drugs but I did 6 years in prison and it isn't what it was.....I missed my fam....all jokes aside it was one slow ride...so I keep this day job and pray to God that one day my dreams will come true and I got enough to give back....that will be the day...until then here I stand ..still ken...bumping slim shit....that rap god track.....my fuckin  favorite. ..the acrobatics and verbal communication are the greatest in generations...college lit professors have stated this guy's the best with words since Shakespeare ........listened to renegade slim took his pain and life's lemons chewed them up and spit minute maid for minutes straight. ..I love it all.....thanks for changing my life ..and letting me into yours...
